oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Josiah C. Wheatley carte-de-visite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite of Pvt. Josiah C. Wheatley, Co. D, 65th Ind. Inf. Regt., USA. He was born in Ohio in July of 1825. Wheatley enrolled in Co. D, 65th Indiana Inf., USA, on August 1, 1862, at Rockport, Indiana. He was discharged July 3, 1865 in Louisville, Kentucky. The regiment fought in the Knoxville Campaign as mounted infantry. They were dismounted in April 1864 and served throughout the Atlanta, Tennessee and Carolinas Campaigns. Wheatley wears a private purchase sack coat and holds his forage cap.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wheatley, Josiah C.
